price: Deε wͻka ne sε: “Adεn na ͻmfa nsεnkyerεnee bi mfri ne Wura Nyankopͻn hͻ mmerε yεn?“ Nkyerεkyerεmu anaa nyinasoͻ pefee a εwͻ Nwoma a edii kan no mu no mmaa wͻn hͻ?
arabic: وَقَالُواْ لَوۡلَا يَأۡتِينَا بِـَٔايَةٖ مِّن رَّبِّهِۦٓۚ أَوَلَمۡ تَأۡتِهِم بَيِّنَةُ مَا فِي ٱلصُّحُفِ ٱلۡأُولَىٰ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: waqālū lawlā yatīnā biāyatin min rabbihi awalam tatihim bayyinatu mā fī al-ṣuḥufi al-ūlā
